parameters.name: BusinessType
parameters.description:
The log category. Valid values:

*   dcdn_log_access_l1 (default): access logs.
*   dcdn_log_er: Edge Routine logs.
*   dcdn_log_waf: firewall logs.
*   dcdn_log_ipa: TCP/UDP proxy logs.

parameters.name: FieldName
parameters.description: The log fields that you want to include in logs to be delivered. Separate the log fields with commas (,).

parameters.name: TaskName
parameters.description: The name of the delivery task.
